amendment.description: An amendment numbered 159 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to increase the amount for Heavy Dump Truck, 20T (CCE), Other Procurement, Army Budget Activity by $30 million and decrease the amount for development of the Future Tactical Unmanned Aircraft System, Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army by $30 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Joyce (PA) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Joyce (PA) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
